description:
Bertha is a master Ground-type Trainer and member of the Sinnou Elite Four. While on their way to the Grand Festival at the Lake Side Resort, Ash and his friends encountered Bertha and Brock recognized her almost immediately. She took him aside and told him not to reveal her identity to anyone else but Brock found it hard to and eventually told his friends who she was by accident.
Bertha observed Ash and his friends as the tracked down Team Rocket and recovered Youshichi`s Magby. After Team Rocket was disposed of and were sent flying away, Ash asked Bertha for a battle which she agreed to. She sent out her Hippowdon to battle against Ash`s Torterra. After a fierce battle between the two, Hippowdon was victorious.
name: Kikuno
